mapper.select: SELECT BC.BOOK_CLUB_SEQ AS bookClubSeq, BC.BOOK_CLUB_NAME AS name, BC.BOOK_CLUB_DESC AS description, BC.BOOK_CLUB_RG AS region, BC.BOOK_CLUB_MAX_MEMBER AS maxMember, BC.BANNER_IMG_URL AS bannerImgUrl, BC.BOOK_CLUB_SCHEDULE AS schedule, BC.CRT_DTM AS createdAt FROM BOOK_CLUB BC JOIN BOOK_CLUB_MEMBER BCM ON BC.BOOK_CLUB_SEQ = BCM.BOOK_CLUB_SEQ WHERE BCM.MEMBER_SEQ = #{member_seq} AND BCM.JOIN_ST = 'JOINED' ORDER BY BC.CRT_DTM DESC

SELECT BC.BOOK_CLUB_SEQ AS bookClubSeq, BC.BOOK_CLUB_NAME AS name, BC.BOOK_CLUB_DESC AS description, BC.BOOK_CLUB_RG AS region, BC.BOOK_CLUB_MAX_MEMBER AS maxMember, BC.BANNER_IMG_URL AS bannerImgUrl, BC.BOOK_CLUB_SCHEDULE AS schedule, W.CRT_DTM AS createdAt FROM BOOK_CLUB BC JOIN BOOK_CLUB_WISH W ON BC.BOOK_CLUB_SEQ = W.BOOK_CLUB_SEQ WHERE W.MEMBER_SEQ = #{member_seq} ORDER BY W.CRT_DTM DESC
